statements: DELETE FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_id = 1001 AND claim_type = 'Car Accident';
DELETE FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_date < '2021-01-01' AND claim_amount > 5000.00;
DELETE FROM claim_frequency WHERE claim_type = 'Auto' AND claim_frequency > 5;
DELETE FROM claim_frequency WHERE claim_type = 'Medical' AND claim_frequency > 5;
DELETE FROM claimants WHERE claimant_id IN (SELECT claimant_id FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_type = 'Car Accident');
DELETE FROM insurance_companies WHERE company_location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_id = 101 AND policy_number = 5001;
DELETE FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 201 AND policyholder_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_name = 'John Doe';
